channel.title: Hardware on Linux is my way
channel.description: Recent content in Hardware on Linux is my way

item.title: Lenovo V155-15api with CentOS
item.description: Last month, I was looking for a cheap laptop with good Gpu, Cpu and good amount of Ram. I searched on internet for a while, Ryzen models was looking good and I found Lenovo v155-15api on hepsiburada.com. It had Ryzen 3500U Apu with 12 GB ram. Lenovo V155-15api My purpose was running Davinci Resolve and Blender 3D for video editing and 3D animations and my budget was very limited (around 500$) so I have decided to buy it.
